name: Get Life
description:
Live your way of life but don't forget that death is always following you as Time flies by. If this game gets popular I'll add Multiplayer support :) have fun guys!

Features:

  • Age, happiness, and fitness influence Deaths' velocity
  • Money influences happiness
  • Running increases fitness and age slowly
  • Some buildings unlock with fitting education or at the age of 18
  • Death moves when you move and keeps moving slowly if you stand still
  • some buildings may only be used once
  • cars can kill you
  • you move slower as a small child, so don't skip school

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Spacebar to interact with buildings
  • Controller should work too but couldn't test it

Sourced:

  • Mixamo Animations
  • Advanced Magic FX 13 for the particle effects (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/advancedmagicfx13)

Programs Used:

  • Unreal Engine 4.25
  • Blender
  • Adobe Audition
  • Bosca Ceoil for the music
  • Condenser Mic for Sound effects

Made in one week for the epic MegaJam 2020 solo Project
